article_title: Five Reasons Why Health Insurers Will Need to Change

article_metadata.description: Consumers spend 16 times as long choosing a computer as they do selecting a health plan for themselves and their family. And it should not be a big surprise.
article_metadata.author: Robert Pearl, M.D.
